HSBC H1 2025 Revenue Drops but Grows Adjusted | Generated by AI

Here’s the financial scoop for HSBC in the first half of 2025 (H1 2025):

Revenue Overview

  • Reported revenue: HSBC posted US $34.1 billion in revenue for H1 2025, marking a 9 % decline compared to H1 2024 (hsbc.com).

  • Excluding notable or one‑off items: On a constant‑currency basis and stripping out gains from disposals (like Canada and Argentina in H1 2024), revenue actually increased by 6 % to US $35.4 billion (hsbc.com).

Quick Summary (no table—just concise bullets):

  • Reported Revenue (H1 2025): US $34.1 billion (–9 % year-on-year)
  • Adjusted Revenue (excluding disposals, constant currency): US $35.4 billion (+6 % year-on-year)
